    publications

    The effect of gap flow on vortex-induced vibration of side-by-side cylinder arrangement

    Published in International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering, 2016

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin, and Rajeev K. Jaiman. "The effect of gap flow on vortex-induced vibration of side-by-side cylinder arrangement." International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering. Vol. 58844. American Society of Mechanical Engineers, 2016. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/OMAE2016-1.pdf

    Flow-induced vibrations of riser array system

    Published in International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering, 2016

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Joshi, Vaibhav, Bin Liu, and Rajeev K. Jaiman. "Flow-induced vibrations of riser array system." International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering. Vol. 49934. American Society of Mechanical Engineers, 2016. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/OMAE2016-2.pdf

    Interaction dynamics of gap flow with vortex-induced vibration in side-by-side cylinder arrangement

    Published in Physics of Fluids, 2016

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin, and Rajeev K. Jaiman. "Interaction dynamics of gap flow with vortex-induced vibration in side-by-side cylinder arrangement." Physics of Fluids . 28.12 (2016). http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/POF2016.pdf

    Dynamics and stability of gap-flow interference in a vibrating side-by-side arrangement of two circular cylinders

    Published in Journal of Fluid Mechanics, 2018

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, B., and R. K. Jaiman. "Dynamics and stability of gap-flow interference in a vibrating side-by-side arrangement of two circular cylinders." Journal of Fluid Mechanics 855 (2018): 804-838. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/JFM2018.pdf

    System identification of Abkowitz model for ship maneuvering motion based on ε-support vector regression

    Published in International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering, 2019

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, B., et al. "System identification of Abkowitz model for ship maneuvering motion based on ε-support vector regression." International Conference on Offshore Mechanics and Arctic Engineering. Vol. 58844. American Society of Mechanical Engineers, 2019. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/OMAE2019.pdf

    A Nitsche stabilized finite element method for embedded interfaces: Application to fluid-structure interaction and rigid-body contact

    Published in Journal of Computational Physics, 2020

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin, and Danielle Tan. "A Nitsche stabilized finite element method for embedded interfaces: Application to fluid-structure interaction and rigid-body contact." Journal of Computational Physics. 413 (2020): 109461. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/JCP2020.pdf

    Secondary lock-in of vortex-induced vibration and energy transfer characteristics of a vibrating cylinder subject to cross buoyancy

    Published in Physics of Fluids, 2021

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin, and Hongjun Zhu. "Secondary lock-in of vortex-induced vibration and energy transfer characteristics of a vibrating cylinder subject to cross buoyancy." Physics of Fluids. 33.7 (2021). http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/POF2021.pdf

    A Nitsche stabilized finite element method: Application for heat and mass transfer and fluid–structure interaction

    Published in Computer Methods in Applied Mechanics and Engineering, 2021

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin. "A Nitsche stabilized finite element method: Application for heat and mass transfer and fluid–structure interaction." Computer Methods in Applied Mechanics and Engineering. 386 (2021): 114101. http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/CMAME2021.pdf

    Vectorised spectral/hp element matrix-free operator for anisotropic heat transport in tokamak edge plasma

    Published in The 8th European Congress on Computational Methods in Applied Scienecs and Engineering, 2022

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Liu, Bin, et al. "Vectorised spectral/hp element matrix-free operator for anisotropic heat transport in tokamak edge plasma." The 8th European Congress on Computational Methods in Applied Sciences and Engineering. 2022 http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/VEC2022.pdf

    Published in Physics of Fluids, 2022

    Download paper here

    Recommended citation: Zhu, Hongjun, Jiawen Zhong, and Bin Liu. "Fluid–thermal–structure interaction of three heated circular cylinders in tandem at a low Reynolds number of 150." Physics of Fluids. 34.8 (2022). http://liu-bin-fluid.github.io/flowmatrix.github.io/files/POF2022.pdf

    Published in Physics of Fluids, 2022

    Download paper here
